fields.description:
If you set the defaultunit via {{tiapp.xml}} using {{<property name="ti.ui.defaultunit">dp</property>}} you can request this in run-time using {{Ti.App.Properties.getString('ti.ui.defaultunit');}}.

However, I'd like to also have {{Ti.App.defaultUnit}} return one of the {{Ti.UI.UNIT_*}} constants, so that in a widget or module (where I'm not in control of the {{tiapp.xml}}) I can more easily detect the current setting and use this e.g. in {{Ti.UI.convertUnits}} when doing complex layout calculations.
fields.summary: Selected defaultunit should be available under Ti.UI
